original_text: And there followed him a great company of people, and of women, which also bewailed and lamented him.
korean_text: 또 백성과 및 그를 위하여 가슴을 치며 슬피 우는 여자의 큰 무리가 따라오는지라

sentences.original_text: And there followed him a great company of people
which also bewailed and lamented him
sentences.korean_translation: 그들도 그를 위해 슬피 울며 애통했다
